4306150.name: Pixelarium: Free Lands Demo
4306150.description:
Embark on your journey into the Free Lands, where the title of "hero" veils a grim truth.

Battle dangerous creatures, demons, and uncover hidden secrets in this turn-based, open-world roguelike.

What begins as a quest for honor soon turns into a fight for survival against relentless challenges.

FEATURES

  • Open-World Exploration – Roam freely across a vast world, with a unique layout for each playthrough. From lush forests to scorched volcanic deserts, the environment shifts dramatically as you approach the island's core.

  • Freedom to Build Your Character – Create a truly unique hero without being locked into a class system. Customize your abilities and stats to match your playstyle.

  • Multiple Game Modes – Choose between various modes of play to suit your style. Challenge yourself in Survival Mode (Permadeath), where every death counts and leaderboards keep track of your best runs, or enjoy a more narrative-driven experience in Campaign Mode.

  • Unique Spell System – Master a variety of powerful and creative spells, each with its own unique mechanics. Combine and experiment to create devastating combos and strategic effects.

  • Summon Allies – Call upon powerful allies to aid you in battle, from reanimated skeletons to formidable golems. Use your summoned forces to tip the scales in your favor.

  • A Wide Variety of Items – Collect a diverse range of weapons, armor, consumables, and mounts that will enhance your power and allow for a personalized playstyle.

  • Unique Items – Discover rare, one-of-a-kind items that provide powerful effects.

  • Main and Procedural Side Quests – Engage in the main storyline while enjoying procedurally generated side quests that provide new challenges and surprises with every playthrough.

  • Diverse Dungeons – Explore a variety of dungeons, each filled with hidden treasures and dangerous enemies. Each dungeon is a unique experience, offering new rewards and surprises.

  • Detailed Sound Design – Every sound in Pixelarium Free Lands has been carefully crafted to match the game's atmosphere. From the peaceful environment to the intense combat, the high-quality sound effects are designed to immerse you fully in your adventure.
